snippet: The administration announced an initiative to make solar energy more accessible to Americans at lower income levels.
abstract: Obama administration announces plan to triple capacity of renewable energy systems installed in federally subsidized housing by 2020, effort aimed at providing easier access to solar energy and other renewable energy sources for low- and middle-income people; also says charities, investors, and local and state government have committed more than $520 million to solar and energy-efficient projects in lower-income communities.
lead_paragraph: The administration announced an initiative to make solar energy more accessible to Americans at lower income levels.

headline.main: Obama Plan Would Give Poor Easier Access to Solar Energy
headline.print_headline: Obama Plan Would Give Poor Easier Access to Solar Energy
